SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Observer

Interface ServerObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface ServerObserver
Interface used to implement the Observer-Observable pattern between Server and GameController. This interface allows the GameController to observe the Server. It contains all the methods to handle every type of received message.
